```{r}
data <- read.delim("F:/promec/Results/Ani/Mirta/data.txt",row.names=1,sep="\t",header = T)
summary(data)
cor(data)
dataasmat<-as.matrix(data)
hist(dataasmat)
heatmap(na.omit(dataasmat))
```

